name: 7-Wonders
desc: Explore the New 7 Wonders of the World through this interactive website. Featuring stunning visuals and smooth animations, it offers a captivating virtual tour. Discover key facts and history about each monument with a clean, responsive design.

name: Real Estate
desc: A full-stack real estate platform built with a modern front-end using HTML, CSS, JS, and Bootstrap. The back-end, powered by PHP, dynamically manages property listings stored in a MySQL database.
